channel.title: SoftLayer_Container_User_Customer_External_Binding_Phone_Mode on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Container_User_Customer_External_Binding_Phone_Mode on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_User_Customer_External_Binding_Phone_Mode
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_User_Customer_External_Binding_Phone_Mode Datatype Description This container can be used to configure the phone authentication mode. By default, “VOICE_CALL” in “STANDARD” mode with no Pin number will be used. With the default mode, you will have to answer a phone call from a trusted 2 form factor vendor during authentication process. You have to answer the call and follow the instruction in order to complete the authentication. You can also use SMS text message or PhoneFactor mobile app modes (in case you’re using PhoneFactor).
